hero.title: In the Heart of Hongdae,
hero.subtitle: Da-woo Guesthouse
hero.description1: A private guesthouse located in a quiet residential area, just 30 seconds walk from Hongdae shopping street.
hero.description2: All rooms have private bathrooms with showers. Comfortable bedding and basic amenities are provided, with luggage storage available on check-in/out days.

single.description: Cozy private space for one. 10㎡ with 1 double bed.

double.description: Perfect for 1-2 guests. 13㎡ with 1 double bed.

triple.description: Great value for 3 people. 1 super single + 1 double bed.

quad.description: Ideal for families/groups. 2 double + 1 super single bed.

dormitory.description: Female-only 5-bed dormitory with spacious common area.

location.title: Location
location.subway: 5 min walk from Hongik Univ. Station Exit 6
location.directions: Exit from Hongik Univ. Station Exit 6, search for 'Tomoto Curry' on the map. Enter the alley between the buildings where 'Tomoto Curry' and 'TARRTARR' are located.
location.parkingWarning: Parking is not available. Public transportation is recommended.

faq.title: FAQ / Guest Information
faq.subtitle: Essential information for your stay at Da-woo House.

checkinMethod.title: Check-in/Access Method
checkinMethod.content: Access available with password provided before check-in.

luggage.title: Luggage Storage
luggage.content: Limited storage space, available only on check-in/out days.

paymentMethods.title: Payment Methods
paymentMethods.content: Toss·PayPal (separate processing fee, room rate includes VAT), bank transfer with zero fee. On-site cash payment is also available, requiring a 10,000 KRW deposit and submission of flight information and passport photo via messenger/email.

pending.title: Payment Pending
pending.content: Room reservation is held for 1 hour before payment, automatically cancelled if unpaid.

cancellation.title: Cancellation/Change Policy
cancellation.content: Free cancellation/change until 14 days before check-in, no cancellation/change within 14 days. Full amount charged as penalty for no-shows.

roomFacilities.title: Room Facilities
roomFacilities.content: All rooms have private shower·air conditioning·blackout blinds, TV (except dormitory), mini fridge·hairdryer·mirror·mini vanity, and water purifier in the hallway.

breakfast.title: Breakfast
breakfast.content: Simple snacks suitable for in-flight consumption. Considering various flight times, 'next day breakfast' is set on each room tray every afternoon. Please use only your room's tray.

noise.title: Noise
noise.content: Converted house, not completely soundproof. Please be especially mindful of noise late at night.

toilet.title: Toilet
toilet.content: No foreign objects in toilet (charges may apply for blockage/damage).

eating.title: Eating in Room
eating.content: Eating in room allowed, but please be mindful of stains and odors.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: After booking, please add our messenger and send check-in date and name. If unable to reach, we will guide via your email.

about.title: Our Story

about.safestayEnd: and is a legal lodging facility.
about.goal: Da-woo Guesthouse aims to be the

about.facilities: We use hotel-grade bedding and eco-friendly interiors, with professional cleaning staff maintaining all rooms in pristine condition. We also provide personalized 1:1 service for true relaxation.
about.mission: We will grow into a truly 'Hongdae-like' guesthouse that presents differentiated value through endless creativity and challenge.
